name: Bharath Kumar
summary: Motivated Computer Science undergraduate with hands-on experience in data science, data structures and algorithms, and IT support. Skilled in problem-solving, technical troubleshooting, and applying analytical tools to real-world challenges. Seeking to contribute technical expertise and adaptability to dynamic team environments.

details: Developed and evaluated data science and ML models using Python, Pandas, and Scikit-learn.
Built end-to-end ML pipelines including preprocessing, visualization, and evaluation.
Contributed to project prototypes showcasing practical ML applications in business solutions.

projects.title: Breast Cancer Prediction (ML Project)
details: Implemented ML models (Random Forest, SVM) for diagnostic prediction.
Evaluated using ROC-AUC, precision, and recall; ranked Top 10% among 60+ projects.

projects.title: Social Media Sentiment Analysis (Python, NLP)
details: Analyzed 5000+ tweets using TF-IDF and Logistic Regression.
Visualized sentiment trends using Seaborn and Matplotlib.

achievements: Achieved a LeetCode contest rating of 1686, demonstrating strong algorithmic ability.
Secured a top rank in Bennett University’s internal coding challenge organized by the Coding Club.
